attributes.action: Open a children’s and adolescent mental health inpatient ward in Lincolnshire
attributes.additional_details: It needs more attention brining forward and for them to approve one being built
attributes.background: I believe that their should be a inpatient mental health ward for children opened in Lincolnshire as the closest ones are hours away resulting in young people are not able to see family regularly at all and it becomes expensive for those whose parents and family can visit due to the cost of fuel

rejection.details: We could accept a petition calling for the Government to provide funding for new Child and Adolescent Mental Health Service facilities
